menus

Class AchievementMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • menus.AchievementMenu

  • public class AchievementMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    The class responsible for formatting the achievement menu. The menu will be modified on completion of event, ie add a "completed" label (for now...) This class is also responsible of the achievement banner (for now...)
